00028 const bool SceneNodeIterator::hasNext()
00029 {
00030 
00031     if (iter == children->end() || ++iter == children->end())
00032     {
00033         --iter;
00034         return false;
00035     }
00036     else
00037         return true;

00040 SceneNode* SceneNodeIterator::next()
00041 {
00042     if (++iter == children->end())
00043     {
00044         --iter;
00045         return NULL;
00046     }
00047     else
00048     {
00049         ++iter;
00050         return iter->second;
00051     }
00052 }

00054 SceneNode* SceneNodeIterator::previous()
00055 {
00056     if (iter == children->begin())
00057         return children->begin()->second;
00058     else
00059     {
00060         --iter;
00061         return iter->second;
00062     }
00063 }

00065 SceneNode* SceneNodeIterator::current()
00066 {
00067     if (iter == children->end())
00068         return NULL;
00069     else
00070         return iter->second;
00071 }

00073 void SceneNodeIterator::remove()
00074 {
00075     if (iter == children->begin())
00076     {
00077         parent->removeChildSceneNode(iter->second);
00078         iter = children->begin();
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082         std::map<std::string, SceneNode*>::iterator iter2 = ++iter;
00083         --iter;
00084 
00085         parent->removeChildSceneNode(iter->second);
00086         iter = iter2;
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void SceneNodeIterator::destroy()
00091 {
00092     if (iter == children->begin())
00093     {
00094         parent->destroyChildSceneNode(iter->second);
00095         iter = children->begin();
00096     }
00097     else
00098     {
00099         std::map<std::string, SceneNode*>::iterator iter2 = ++iter;
00100         --iter;
00101 
00102         parent->destroyChildSceneNode(iter->second);
00103         iter = iter2;
00104     }
00105 }

00131 SceneNode* SceneNode::createChildSceneNode(const string& name)
00132 {
00133     if (children.find(name) != children.end())
00134     {
00135         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Replacing child entity [" + name + "] of entity [" + this->name + "]. createChildSceneNode(string name)");
00136         SceneManager::get()->destroySceneNode(name);
00137     }
00138 
00139     children[name] = SceneManager::get()->createSceneNode(name);
00140     children[name]->setParent(this);
00141     return children[name];
00142 }
00143 
00144 SceneNode* SceneNode::attachChildSceneNode(const string& name)
00145 {
00146     SceneNode* toAdd = SceneManager::get()->getSceneNode(name);
00147     attachChildSceneNode(toAdd);
00148     return children[name];
00149 }

00151 void SceneNode::attachChildSceneNode(SceneNode* entity)
00152 {
00153     if (entity->getParent() != this)
00154     {
00155         if (entity->getParent() != NULL)
00156             entity->getParent()->removeChildSceneNodeFromMap(entity);
00157         entity->setParent(this);
00158         children[entity->getName()] = entity;
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 SceneNode* SceneNode::removeChildSceneNode(const string& name)
00163 {
00164     if (children.find(name) == children.end())
00165     {
00166         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + name + "] is not a child of [" + this->name + "].  removeChildSceneNode(string name)");
00167         return NULL;
00168     }
00169     else
00170     {
00171 
00172         SceneNode* ret = children[name];
00173         if (parent != SceneManager::get()->getNullSceneNode())
00174         {
00175             SceneManager::get()->getNullSceneNode()->attachChildSceneNode(ret);
00176             children.erase(name);
00177         }
00178 
00179         return ret;
00180     }
00181 }
00182 
00183 void SceneNode::removeChildSceneNode(SceneNode* entity)
00184 {
00185     if (children.find(entity->getName()) == children.end())
00186         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + entity->getName() + "] is not a child of [" + name + "].  removeChildSceneNode(SceneNode@ ent)");
00187     else
00188     {
00189         if (parent != SceneManager::get()->getNullSceneNode())
00190         {
00191             SceneManager::get()->getNullSceneNode()->attachChildSceneNode(entity);
00192             children.erase(entity->getName());
00193         }
00194     }
00195 }

00197 void SceneNode::removeChildSceneNodeFromMap(SceneNode* entity)
00198 {
00199     children.erase(entity->getName());
00200 }

00207 void SceneNode::destroyChildSceneNode(const string& name)
00208 {
00209     if (children.find(name) == children.end())
00210         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + name + "] is not a child of [" + this->name + "]. destroyChildSceneNode(string name)");
00211     else
00212         SceneManager::get()->destroySceneNode(children[name]);
00213 }

00215 void SceneNode::destroyChildSceneNode(SceneNode* entity)
00216 {
00217     if (children.find(entity->getName()) == children.end())
00218         Utils::get()->writeToLog("SceneNode with name [" + entity->getName() + "] is not a child of [" + name + "]. destroyChildSceneNode(SceneNode@ ent)");
00219     else
00220         SceneManager::get()->destroySceneNode(entity);
00221 }

00223 void SceneNode::destroyAllChildren()
00224 {
00225     while (children.begin() != children.end())
00226         destroyChildSceneNode(children.begin()->second);
00227 }

00257 Component* SceneNode::removeComponent()
00258 {
00259     if (component != NULL)
00260     {
00261         component->notifyRemoved(this);
00262         component = NULL;
00263         return component;
00264     }
00265     return NULL;
00266 }

00279 const hgeVector SceneNode::getWorldPosition()
00280 {
00281     if (parent == NULL || parent == SceneManager::get()->getNullSceneNode() || parent == SceneManager::get()->getRootSceneNode())
00282         return position;
00283     else
00284     {
00285         Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00286 
00287         hgeVector parentPosition = parent->getWorldPosition();
00288 
00289         double radius = sqrt(position.x * position.x + position.y * position.y);
00290         double angle = atan2(position.y, position.x);
00291         hgeVector returnVector(cos((angle + utils->angleRadians(parent->getWorldRotation()))) * radius, sin((angle + utils->angleRadians(parent->getWorldRotation()))) * radius);
00292 
00293         returnVector.x *=  (parent->getWorldScale());
00294         returnVector.y *=  (parent->getWorldScale());
00295 
00296         returnVector.x += parentPosition.x;
00297         returnVector.y += parentPosition.y;
00298         return returnVector;
00299     }
00300 }
00301 
00302 void SceneNode::translate(const hgeVector translateVec, const TransformSpace& tSpace)
00303 {
00304     Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00305     switch (tSpace)
00306     {
00307     case TS_LOCAL:
00308         position.x += (-sin(utils->angleRadians(rotation)) * -translateVec.x + cos(utils->angleRadians(rotation)) * translateVec.y);
00309         position.y += (sin(utils->angleRadians(rotation)) * translateVec.y + cos(utils->angleRadians(rotation)) * -translateVec.x);
00310         break;
00311     case TS_PARENT:
00312         position.x += translateVec.x;
00313         position.y += -translateVec.y;
00314         break;
00315     case TS_GLOBAL:
00316         double globalRotation = utils->angleRadians(parent->getWorldRotation());
00317         position.x += (-sin(utils->angleRadians(rotation) + globalRotation) * translateVec.x + cos(utils->angleRadians(rotation) + globalRotation) * translateVec.y);
00318         position.y += (sin(utils->angleRadians(rotation) + globalRotation) * translateVec.y + cos(utils->angleRadians(rotation) + globalRotation) * translateVec.x);
00319         break;
00320     }
00321 }

00333 double SceneNode::getWorldScale()
00334 {

00341 void SceneNode::rotate(const double& angle)
00342 {
00343     rotation += angle;
00344     if (rotation >= 360)
00345         rotation -= 360;
00346     else if (rotation <= -360)
00347         rotation += 360;
00348 }

00360 double SceneNode::getWorldRotation()
00361 {
00362     if (InheritRotation && parent != NULL && parent != SceneManager::get()->getRootSceneNode())
00363         return getRotation() + parent->getWorldRotation();
00364     else
00365         return getRotation();
